GDevelop is an open-source game creator,: GDevelop este un creator de jocuri open-source, adaptat pentru realizarea rapidă și intuitivă a jocurilor.
Use JavaScript with the game engine: Folosiți JavaScript cu motorul de joc
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop a fost creat cu dragoste de către
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: care au adăugat feature-uri, au reparat bug-uri, au trimis noi exemple, au scris tutoriale si au ajutat comunitatea.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB este o creatură unică și foarte specială. Mai exact, ea este [cea mai incredibilă pisică de pe planetă](http://lilbub.com)... și jocul ei este făcut cu GDevelop!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: Jocul este unul retro 8-bit, cu artă si muzică nemaipomenită, care alternează între nivele "platformer" cu secrete ascunse și nivele cu împușcături care au câte un boss.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights este un joc suculent, jet-combat, roguelike în care vei distruge, te vei feri și îți vei tăia calea printr-o grămadă de inamici inferiori din punct de vedere tehnologic.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: În timp ce misiunea ta intergalactică de intervenție progresează, hyper-jetul tău adaptiv va evolua în ceva mai puternic și mai ciudat prin colectarea unor sute de iteme disponibile în joc.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Imaginează-ți si publică jocurile tale cu GDevelop. Combinat cu tutoriale si exemple.
Add ads to your game with AdMob: Adaugă reclame jocului tau cu AdMob
Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to disp: Foloseste AdMob in jocurile tale GDevelop pentru a afisa reclame video utilizatorilor
Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google: Intră pe site-ul AdMob (https://www.google.com/admob/) si creaza un cont. Apoi, creați o aplicație nouă din interfața AdMob și o unitate de anunțuri. Rețineți identificatorii atât pentru aplicație, cât și pentru unitatea de anunțuri, deoarece vor fi folosiți în jocul dvs.
In GDevelop, open the properties of your: În GDevelop, deschideți proprietățile jocului dvs. și puneți ID-ul aplicației AdMob **app id**. Aceasta va fi identificată pentru a utiliza aplicația dvs. pentru AdMob pentru a difuza anunțuri.
Add events in your game to load and show: Adăugați evenimente în jocul dvs. pentru a încărca și afișa anunțul când este nevoie (acest lucru poate fi atunci când un nivel este finalizat cu succes). Inserați în parametrii acțiunii identificatorul unității de anunțuri. Puteți introduce, de asemenea, „test” pentru încărcarea unui anunț test.
You can test and publish your game on An: Puteți testa și publica jocul dvs. pe Android direct de la GDevelop. În editor, deschideți jocul și apoi fereastra Export. Alegeți Android, faceți clic pe Export și așteptați câteva minute.
How to publish to Android in one click: Cum să publici pe Android cu un click
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Contribuie la GDevelop - Motor open-source de jocuri HTLM5
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop este un proiect open-source (până și acest website): oricine poate sa contribuie și să îmbunătățească software-ul!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Există multe modalități prin care poți contribui la GDevelop, în funcție de timpul tău liber, abilitățile tale si ceea ce te interesează.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop si website-ul pot fi traduse in limba ta! Traducerile sunt făcute pe un website unde toată lumea poate să se implice.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Este ușor să faci rost de codul sursă de la GDevelop și să incepi să îmbunătățești lucruri!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Forumul si chat-ul de pe Discord sunt locurile unde poți obține și oferi ajutor altor utilizatori GDevelop!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Urmărește GDevelop pe Facebook si Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: Pentru majoritatea începătorilor și până și utilizatoritorilor avansați, tutorialele și pagina de ajutor sunt cele mai valoroase resurse pentru a crea jocuri grozave rapid.
Create custom behaviors for your game ob: Creați comportamente personalizate pentru obiectele de joc din GDevelop
In a few clicks, you can create new beha: În câteva clicuri, puteți crea noi comportamente pentru obiectele dvs. de joc - utilizând evenimente sau JavaScript.
Flash is a custom behavior that is creat: Flash este un comportament personalizat care este creat direct din GDevelop - care permite unui obiect să clipească
Create custom behaviors - directly from: Creați comportamente personalizate - direct de la editorul GDevelop
GDevelop allows you to create new behavi: GDevelop vă permite să creați noi comportamente, folosind aceleași evenimente ca și cele pe care le utilizați pentru a crea regulile jocului dvs.
Want enemies to automatically follow the: Doriți ca dușmanii să urmarească automat jucătorul?
Want some rockets to target the player?: Doriți câteva rachete care să țintească jucătorul?
Want enemies and the players to have hea: Doriți ca inamicii și jucătorii să aibă viață și să ia lovituri?
Behaviors can be created for any kind of: Comportamentele pot fi create pentru orice fel de obiect și puteți crea acțiuni și condiții personalizate asociate noului dvs. comportament.
An action is exposed by the behavior, an: O acțiune este expusă de comportament și poate fi folosită ca orice altă acțiune din evenimente
Import new behaviors, created by the GDe: Importați noi comportamente, create de comunitatea GDevelop
Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be: Comportamentele, precum și extensiile, pot fi partajate între proiecte. Puteți să le exportați și să le importați ** în câteva clicuri. Dacă comportamentul dvs. este generic și reutilizabil în mai multe jocuri, puteți chiar să îl trimiteți pentru a fi integrat în lista în creștere a comportamentelor personalizate partajate de comunitate.
Progressively create custom behaviors fo: Creează progresiv comportamente personalizate pentru obiectele din jocul tău
ideal for large games and keeping simple: ideal pentru jocuri mari și păstrarea unor evenimente simple.
Search for new behaviors in the list of: Căutați noi comportamente în lista comportamentelor partajate de comunitate
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Descarcă GDevelop sau încearcă-l online - creează jocuri fară programare
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop este gratuit și poate fi folosit pentru facerea de jocuri profitabilă cât și neprofitabilă.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop rulează pe Windows, macOS si majoritatea distribuțiilor de Linux recente. Puteți de asemenea să-l încercați online folosind Chrome, Firefox sau alt browser recent.
Wonder what's new in latest versions? Fi: Vă întrebați ce este nou în ultimele versiuni? Găsiți notele de lansare în aplicație sau [online] (https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop/releases).
You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system: Aveți nevoie de **libconf-2-4** pe sistemul dumneavoastră. Scrieți `sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4` într-un terminal sau instalați-l folosind package managerul sistemului vostru.
To create your first game, start by read: Pentru a crea primul vostru joc, începeți prin a citi un tutorial:
Create a tank shooter game: Creeați un joc de tip "tank shooter"
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop este un proiect open-source. Poţi să te implici în Comunitate pentru a îmbunătăţi!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: Gdevelop 4 poate fi descărcat în continuare. GDevelop 5 este recomandat pentru orice utilizator nou, deoarece GDevelop 4 nu va mai fi actualizat! În viitor, pentru GDevelop 4 nu va fi oferit niciun sprijin: recomandăm utilizatorilor GDevelop 4 să facă upgrade la GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Chiar dacă GDevelop 4 suportă jocuri native, vă recomandăm trecerea la jocurile GDevelop 5 și HTML5, care sunt mai bine acceptate. Jocurile native vor fi adăugate la GDevelop 5 mai târziu.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop pentru educație - Învățați crearea de jocuri
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Folosirea GDevelop în sala de clasă reprezintă oportunitatea perfectă de a preda programarea, creare jocuri și pentru dezvoltarea creativitatii elevilor.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop a fost deja folosit în săli de clasă și cursuri online, cu studenți în mediul digital media sau copii de clasa I!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Trimiteți-ne fotografiile și tweeturile dacă utilizați GDevelop pentru un curs!
Install new extensions in GDevelop and s: Instalați extensii noi în GDevelop și partajați-vă
Search and add new features to your game: Căutați și adăugați noi funcții în jocul dvs. în câteva clicuri.
Search in the library of extensions, rea: Căutați în biblioteca de extensii, gata de instalare într-un singur clic
Directly from the editor, you can explor: Directly from the editor, you can explore the **online library of extensions** (also called a "package manager" or an "extension store"). Extensions can bring *new behaviors* for your game objects, or *actions, conditions* or expressions that are ready to use in events.
**Featured extensions** are peer reviewe: **Featured extensions** are peer reviewed. They are ideal to add new features at a fast pace to your game, making both prototyping of new games a very quick process and allowing larger games to be constructed by assembling extensions.
Export your own extensions and share the: Export your own extensions and share them
All extensions can be exported to a file: All extensions can be exported to a file. They can easily be shared and integrated to another project. Better, if you have created a useful extension, you can submit it to be integrated to the library of [open-source, community extensions](https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop-extensions).
As extensions are constructed using the: As extensions are constructed using the intuitive GDevelop events sheets, they can be composed of events, [JavaScript or a mix of both](/javascript-game-engine).
How to start a new extension: Cum sa pornesti o extensie noua
How to share your extension: Cum sa dai share extensiei tale
Extensions can provide new behaviors tha: Extensiile pot adauga comportamente noi pentru obiectele din joc.
Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelo: Make Facebook Instant Games with GDevelop - publish your games on Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Cu GDevelop, puteți exporta jocul dvs. ca joc instantaneu Facebook în 2 clicuri.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Creați aplicația dvs. pe dezvoltatorii Facebook
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: Primul lucru, asigurați-vă că aveți un cont pe ** Developers Facebook **. Creați o aplicație și configurați-o astfel încât să alegeți categoria "Jocuri" și să activați Jocuri instantanee în produse:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Deschideți GDevelop și exportați pentru Jocuri instantanee Facebook
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: În GDevelop, deschideți jocul și apoi fereastra Export. Alegeți **Jocuri instantanee Facebook**, faceți clic pe Export și așteptați câteva secunde.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Du-te înapoi la pagina de joc de pe dezvoltatorii Facebook, alegeți Web Hosting din meniu și **încărcați fișierul** care a fost exportat de GDevelop.
You can also add testers to let your fri: De asemenea, puteți adăuga testeri pentru a permite prietenilor să vă încerce jocul.
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Acum, ia-ți telefonul și **deschide mesagerul**. Deschideți o conversație, alegeți Jocuri și faceți clic pe pictograma jocului dvs. pentru a începe să jucați!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Utilizați funcțiile Jocuri instant și publicați-vă jocul!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop vă oferă acces la funcțiile specifice Jocuri instant, cum ar fi numele jucătorului, pentru a vă integra mai bine jocul în conversațiile Messenger.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: Atunci când jocul tău este gata, trimite-l pe Facebook pentru o recenzie, în așa fel incât să devină **disponibil în toată lumea**!
Read the full step-by-step tutorial: Citește întreg tutorialul pas cu pas
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Caracteristici ale GDevelop - creează orice tip de jocuri fără programare
GDevelop is bundled with dozens of featu: GDevelop vine cu zeci de de caracteristici pentru a putea imagina si creea orice fel de jocuri.

Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap: Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap Build or Cordova](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/android_and_ios_with_cordova)).

Export as a stand-alone executable game: Exportă sub formă de joc executabil stand-alone pentru Windows, macOS și Linux
Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-: Display [ads and reward videos](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob) to your players using [AdMob](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob).
Learn how to publish your game: Învață cum să îți publici jocul
Create explosions, fire and impressive e: Creează explozii, foc și efecte impresionante cu **Emițătoare de Particule**
**Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, fl: **Tiled sprites**, to create mosaics, floors and repeating patterns
Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shap: Draw custom shapes on screen with **Shape Painters**
Support for custom collision masks: Suport pentru măști personalizte de coliziune
Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Fă-ți obiectele să se miște și să se ferească de obstacole
create platformer games in a breeze: creează jocuri de tip "platformer" cu ușurință
quickly make your objects draggable with: fă-ți obiectele posibil de tras cu mouse-ul/touch
support multiple screen sizes by ensurin: support multiple screen sizes by ensuring controls stay at the right position
smoothly animate object positions, sizes: smoothly animate object positions, sizes, opacity and colors
And more, to automate current tasks and: Și mai mult, automatizează-ți sarcinile actuale și comportamentele cu doar câteva click-uri!
Make desktop & mobile-ready games: Creează jocuri disponibile pe desktop și telefoane mobile
Save player data in the browser storage: Save player data in the browser storage or on their devices
Full support for sound effects and music: Suport complet pentru efecte sonore și muzică
The scene editor lets you visually edit: Editorul de scenă îți permite să editezi vizual nivelul tău
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Adaugă interfețe și crează efecte parallax
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Crează-ți nivelele în mod dinamic cu structuri externe
a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: un editor puternic de pixel art și sprite-uri
create effects and customize them in a f: create effects and customize them in a few clicks
Inspect the content of your game and mak: Inspectă conținutul jocului tău și fă schimbari dinamice în timp ce previzualizezi jocul
[monitor the resource expensive spots](h: [monitorizează locurile care consumă multe resurse](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/interface/debugger/profile-your-game) în jocul tău
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Construiește jocuri ambițioase cu caracteristici avansate
Communicate with external websites or se: Communicate with external websites or services using HTTP requests.
Create reusable **functions** using even: Create reusable **functions** using events, that can be used as actions, conditions or expressions in your game
a powerful feature never seen in other g: a powerful feature never seen in other game creation tools.
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures, with support for reading/writing JSON.
You can [use JavaScript to code](/javasc: You can [use JavaScript to code](/javascript-game-engine) parts of your game
use it for a few functions, to write ext: use it for a few functions, to write extensions or the majority of your game.
Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/a: Display ads in your game with [AdMob](/ads-in-your-game-with-admob) or link to products from your [Shopify shop](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/all-features/shopify).
Search and [install new features with ex: Search and [install new features with extensions](/extensions-and-sharing), built by the community
get new, ready to use features for your: get new, ready to use features for your game in a few clicks
All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: Toți editorii ai GDevelop - crează jocuri de tip platformer, shooter, RPG, action...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: Interfața GDevelop este formată din editori intuitivi pentru a crea designul jocurilor tale de la zero.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: Vezi cum să folosești GDevelop pentru a adăuga o funcție de declanșare (trigger) în jocul tău în 90 de secunde
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Crează propriile tale jocuri cu editorul de scenă: poți să alegi obiecte, să le pui pe scenă și să le ajustezi poziția și dimensinile. Poți să creezi nivelele tale în întregime cu editorul de scenă. Dacă dorești să creezi nivele sau interfețe complexe, layout-urile externe îți dau voie să creezi părți ale unui nivel și apoi să le refolosești în alte scene.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Începe în două minute: Încearcă GDevelop în browser
Imagining and creating the rules of your: Imagining and creating the rules of your game do not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: All conditions and actions are available in a list so you can easily discover and find what you want to make the rules of your game.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Learn more about events in the tutorials
Develop space shooter games with GDevelo: Develop space shooter games with GDevelop
Everything that is displayed on the scre: Everything that is displayed on the screen of your game is an object. Most objects are called sprites: they are composed of animations and can be used for any animated element. For example, your player, enemies or bonuses to pick.
Other object are also available to creat: Other object are also available to create interfaces or add effects to your game: texts, particles, tiled sprites...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Discover all the objects available in GDevelop
Resources editor, sprite editor and soun: Resources editor, sprite editor and sound effect generator
All the images and audio files used in y: All the images and audio files used in your game are listed in the Resources Editor. It's a simple way to manage your game assets.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel. You can also create sound effect in a single click using the integrated sound generator. It's perfect for [game jams](/game-jams/)!
Learn everything about the editors in th: Learn everything about the editors in the documentation
Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Examples of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples an: GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: These are the examples bundled with GDevelop. Curious? You can open and try them directly from your browser. GDevelop is fast to start and you'll be playing with the examples in seconds.
Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop o: Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop or get help about a specific feature: the wiki has tutorials for beginners and a complete documentation for the software.
GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly ma: GDevelop is a perfect fit for quickly making games during game jams.
GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a s: GDevelop is bundled with **Piskel**, a sprite editor that is perfect to quickly draw your sprites and for pixel-art.
Read more about making 8-bit and pixelar: Read more about making 8-bit and pixelart games
Generate sounds effects in one click: Generate sounds effects in one click
GDevelop has an integrated sound effect: GDevelop has an integrated sound effect generator, **Jfxr**. You can create sounds effects like explosions, jump, coins, power ups in a single click and customize them as you wish.
Read about all features available in GDe: Read about all features available in GDevelop
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Want to create a retro platformer game? GDevelop has a pre-made behaviors that you can attach to your character and your platforms. In a few seconds you have a basic platformer game running and ready to be customized and enhanced! Other behaviors, conditions and actions can also be used to create any kind of 2D games: shmup, "Bullet Hell", arcade games...

GDevelop is a fast and flexible game eng: GDevelop is a fast and flexible game engine that can be used for different use cases.
GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, c: GDevelop is a lightweight game engine, carefully designed and open-source. The unique design of the editor has been explained during [talks in international conferences](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6La7jSCnYyk).
MIT license: extend and contribute to th: MIT license: extend and contribute to the engine source code
Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, Re: Adaptable editor based on JavaScript, React.js and WebAssembly
Integrate GDevelop in your team, use eve: Integrate GDevelop in your team, use events or JavaScript according to your needs
Get game designers, artists and develope: Get game designers, artists and developers to work on the same environment
Game projects are human readable and sup: Game projects are human readable and support version control systems like Git or Mercurial
Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop i: Accessible and easy to learn, GDevelop is ideal for indie game developers. You'll be able to quickly start a game and iterate by using events, behaviors and new extensions.
Free to use: download GDevelop and start: Free to use: download GDevelop and start making a game today
Integrated editors allowing to make game: Integrated editors allowing to make game assets directly from GDevelop
Super fast prototyping with open-source: Super fast prototyping with open-source community extensions and behaviors
Custom behaviors make your game logic re: Custom behaviors make your game logic reusable and shareable
Teaching game creation or programming to: Teaching game creation or programming to kids or students? GDevelop has been used by dozens of schools, universities and bootcamp programs for all ages.

Here are a few games created with GDevel: Here are a few games created with GDevelop. The next one should be yours!
Made a nice game with GDevelop?: Made a nice game with GDevelop?
We'll love to know about your game and a: We'll love to know about your game and add it here. Make sure you have beautiful screenshots ready and that the game is high quality :)
Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side project to our now canceled space exploration roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog was prototyped in late 2016, after which it received a limited early access release on itch.io. Over the course of 2017 the majority of its content was developed and continuous alpha feedback was taken into account. The game was feature-complete in march 2018, after which the release was announced.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Seven zones with distinct enemy composition to explore
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, made with GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Using GDevelop, the game was made available for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux and even published as a real Arcade game.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: The game was announced for BUB's 5th birthday. To help making it a reality, a Kickstarter was launched so that all BUB's friends around the world can contribute. The kickstarter was initially launched with $100,000 as the goal, but reached $148,000! GOOD JOB BUB.
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Huge variety of unique levels, bosses and enemies
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Unique storyline with twists and surprises
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Item Inventory: collect items to be used strategically throughout the game
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Tape Deck feature that allows you to select your favorite music from the game
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Ability to revisit and replay levels to further your progress and unlock achievements
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Creează jocuri fără programare - Software Open Source pentru creearea de jocuri HTML5 şi native
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: GDevelop game maker software - create video games without coding
Make your own games with GDevelop: Make your own games with GDevelop
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game engine designed for everyone - it's extensible, fast and easy to learn.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: With GDevelop, you can make simple projects for fun or create ambitious indie games like [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) and [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
Events: game creation, intuitive for all: Events: game creation, intuitive for all
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Ceea ce face GDevelop unic şi atât de uşor de utilizat sunt evenimentele. Evenimentele sunt o modalitate puternică de exprimare a logicii jocului tău, fără a fi nevoie de a învăţa un limbaj de programare.
GDevelop takes visual programming to the: GDevelop takes visual programming to the next step, allowing you to add [ready-made behaviors](/features) to your game objects and [make new behaviors](/custom-behaviors) using these intuitive, easy to learn events.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: When Space is pressed, the character animation and a sound are played. If a bomb touches the character, they both are destroyed.
Export your game anywhere, in one click: Export your game anywhere, in one click
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS and Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablets or phone: games made with GDevelop can run everywhere
Express your small and big ideas: you ca: Express your small and big ideas: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) has never been so easy and fast, with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation on the wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modular and can be extended to suit your needs. In particular, all features available to games (objects, behaviors, events) are based on the extension system. You can quickly create new extensions for your game or contribute to existing ones as GDevelop is [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), a powerful and easy to use 2D sprite editor. It's the perfect tool to create pixel art assets to give a retro feeling to your game! You can create objects with multiple animations, edit at any time the sprites and see the result by launching a preview of your game.
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made with GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: HELLO EARTH al lui Lil BUB este un joc retro 8-bit cu artă și muzică minunate, care alternează între nivele de tip "platformer", cu secrete ascunse, și nivele de tip "shooter", cu șefi, mulți inamici și bonusuri.
Read more about Lil BUB's game: Citește mai mult despre jocul lui Lil BUB
See other games made with GDevelop: Vezi alte jocuri făcute cu GDevelop
There either has been an error or you ca: There either has been an error or you cancelled the subscription. If you want to get a subscription to support GDevelop and unlock online services, try again to choose one from GDevelop (*My Profile* menu).
As an open-source software, GDevelop req: As an open-source software, GDevelop requires time and money to be developed and sustainable. Thanks for your contribution! If you want to get more involved, you can also [read all the ways](/contribute) to contribute to GDevelop ecosystem.
You can now **go back to GDevelop** to u: You can now **go back to GDevelop** to use the additional online exports and services.
